forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West northwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, a delightful sun bathes the city, lifting spirits as the warmth approaches 65 degrees. The skies are a vibrant blue, unmarred by fog or haze, making for perfect visibility across the landscape. A gentle west wind, carrying whispers of breezy anticipation, flutters at about 14 mph, with playful gusts adding a touch of dynamism to the air. As the evening unfurls, temperatures will settle at a comfortable 56 degrees, gradually warming slightly overnight. 

With such inviting conditions, a light sweater or a breathable jacket will suffice for those venturing out after dusk. The clarity of the day entices one to explore; a stroll through the lively streets of the city or a relaxed gathering at a nearby café could be perfectly rewarding. As the sun sets behind the hills, painting the sky with gentle hues, find pleasure in simple views or quiet conversations, allowing the comforting calm of the evening to encapsulate the charm of this beautiful city.
